text:
While it is not
necessary that an establishment be a “retail or service” establishment for Sec
13(b)(27) to apply, such establishments may qualify for the Sec 13(a)(2)
exemption if the tests are met.
html: While it is not necessary that an establishment be a “retail or service” establishment for Sec 13(b)(27) to apply, such establishments may qualify for the Sec 13(a)(2) exemption if the tests are met.
